gameticket_package

Class Seat

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameticket_package.Seat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstCategorySeat, SecondCategorySeat, ThirdCategorySeat

    public abstract class Seat
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class Holds the seat data, the game have multiple seats Single-responsibility principle

      • chooseSeat

        public static Seat chooseSeat(Seat[] seats,
                              int choice)
                       throws invalidChoiceException
        Static Method, Allows the user to choose a seat from the game seats according to the category he choosed
        Parameters:
        seats - the seats in the game
        choice - the category choosed by the user
        Returns:
        seat according to user choosen category
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException - if user entered wrong seat number

      • removeSeat

        public void removeSeat()
        Marks the seat as unreserved, calculates the seats counts according to the category of seat removed

      • showAvailable

        public static boolean showAvailable(Seat[] seats,
                                    int choice)
        Static Method, Show available seats in the game according to the category choosen by the user
        Parameters:
        seats - the seats in the game
        choice - indicates what category user choosed
        Returns:
        false if no seats are free in this category choosed
